main.name: Nitish Prabhu Kota
main.description: Full Stack Developer and Lead Instructor at Clever Programmer.
main.bio: Software Engineer with 3+ years of professional Full-Stack Web Development experience. Strong technical skills in designing, developing, testing, debugging, and maintaining complex websites. Graduating from The University of Texas at Arlington, Actively looking for Full-Stack Web Developer/Cloud Computing full time opportunities starting from May 2021.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

testimonials.text: Nitish is an hardworking and focused developer. We worked on couple of projects related to document management system, where in he made a lot of key contributions as a full stack developer. He has ability to learn new technology stack quickly and also possess impressive problem solving skills. He is an asset to any team.
testimonials.user: Vikas Tallur | Managing Consultant at Whyte | Former Technology Lead at Infosys Limited

testimonials.text: Nitish is a proactive learner and able to learn any technologies. He can learn any technologies given to him and a tremendous team player. He is expertise in web technologies and good at whichever technologies comes to him.
testimonials.user: Pradeep Prabhu.B.R | Technology Lead at Infosys Limited

testimonials.text: I have worked with Nitish for 2 years at Infosys and I feel that he is highly qualified as a Full-stack Web developer. Nitish is an important contributor to many of our projects. He consistently delivers high quality work, meets or exceeds deadlines, and assists his co-workers at every opportunity. He is organized, communicates well and will go the extra mile needed for success without hesitation. I would highly recommend him for any role he decides to take up in future.
testimonials.user: Mohammed Naeem Kotekar | Senior Information Technology Consultant at Qualogy | Former Technology Analyst at Infosys Limited

testimonials.text: I had the privilege of working with Nitish in Google SDM team for more than two years at Infosys Limited. Nitish is proactive, result oriented, responsible and technically sound employee and he is always ready to put all his energy and time to get the job done. He has exceptional Web development skills and certainly can get my full recommendation.
testimonials.user: Grisha Almeida | Technology Analyst at Infosys Limited
